item.title: Miramar Hotel Group offer now available with Asia Miles
item.description:
Source: Miramar Hotel Taipei website. Miramar Hotel Group is now part of the Asia Miles rewards program. This means members can earn 250 Asia Miles for every qualifying stay at either the Miramar Garden Taipei or Miramar Hotel Hsinchu. To earn miles, members should provide their membership number during booking and show their card upon arrival. Note that this offer applies to deluxe room reservations. For reference, the Miramar Garden Taipei first opened its doors in 2006, followed by the Miramar Hotel Hsinchu in 2013...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/miramar-hotel-group-offer-now-available-with-asia-miles/

item.title: FEH has announced a partnership with SIA's HighFlyer business travel program
item.description:
Source: FEH. The Clan Hotel Singapore lobby. Far East Hospitality (FEH) is the first hotel group to join Singapore Airlinesâ€™ (SIA’s) corporate travel program, HighFlyer. Companies in this program receive discounted airfares and earn HighFlyer points when their staff travel for business. These points can be redeemed for future travel, benefits for their business, or rewards for their traveling employees. Members of HighFlyer can now accumulate up to 500 points when their employees stay at participating Far East Hospitality hotels in Singapore, Japan, and Malaysia...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/feh-has-announced-a-partnership-with-sia-s-highflyer-business-travel-program/
